text: Karuna mhanala, he sarva kahi mala majhya svatahcya jnanamule dile gele ahe. Kaya ataparyanta tyala he mahita jhale nahi ki allahane tyacyapurvi kititari vastivalyanna nasta karuna takale je tyacyapeksa jasta balavana ani jasta dhanavana hote, ani aparadhyanna tyancya aparadhanvisayi asa veli vicarale jata nahi
